name: Save The Tycoon
description:
Save The Tycoon is the most popular slider puzzle game! The goal of the game is to free the tycoon from it by moving other cars
Play instructions:
Just move the blocking car and move the red car that the tycoon is riding to the exit.
Game features:
- One super prize every 3 levels is not to be missed
- Multiple difficulty levels, up to 1000 puzzle levels, and will be constantly updated
- Prompt/reset/cancel button to help solve every level
- Save the path of all the cards you have answered
- Quick and simple tutorial
